name: Commubears! Whose Coup is it Anyway?
name_original: Commubears! Whose Coup is it Anyway?
description: Commubears is a single-player print and play board game where you must overthrow the government! The country is in ruins, now's the time to take control! Campaign around the country, fight those who oppose, debate those who disagree, perform rituals to appease the bear Gods!
